name: ACT! Word Processing Document
summary: Learn about .WPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sage ACT! is a customer relationship management (CRM) program for Windows. It allows businesses to manage, track, and communicate with their customers.

The program includes its own word processor, which allows users to create text documents. In version 3 of ACT!, the program began saving these documents as WPA files. Previously, ACT! saved these documents as .WPD files.
NOTE: Swiftpage acquired ACT! in 2013. The program is now known as Act!.

instructions: You can view the document a WPA file contains with Sage ACT! (Windows). To do so, open the file in ACT!'s word processor.
